constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
CONARA Name: The Groves Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
LBCASE LB Address: 23POPLAR GROVENEW MALDENLB Grade: GD2LB Ref: 4/6

decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of planning permission ref:  20/02321/FUL dated  15/03/2020.Reason: As required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition(s) condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 20/02321/FUL (Demolition of single building garages at 23 Poplar Grove/74 Acacia Grove and erection of replacement garages, replacement of existing concrete hardstanding in front of garages with hardstanding of similar construction, and partial demolition and reconstruction of defective cracked boundary wall at 23 Poplar Grove.) to allow for changes to replace the pyramid hip roof with gable-end roof.
